% Include an image named UseCase.png, allow LaTeX to place
% the image (h)ere, (t)op of page, or (b)ottom of page.
%
% Give the image caption "Use case" and label "fig:usecase"
%

	\centering

	\caption{Use case}
	\label{fig:usecase}
\end{figure}
